programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Chinese martial arts student (Wang Yu) trains hard to defeat the karate expert (Lo Lieh) who brutally killed his master and peers.

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Sparks fly when a female doctor criticizes a fashion designer's creations, but love follows regardless.

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Kick-Ass inspires a new wave of self-made masked crusaders, who become the target of the reborn Red Mist.

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: Zack Snyder's epic fantasy takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her dark reality.

programme.title: Elektra
programme.desc: The film follows Elektra as she tries to save those she loves while simultaneously fighting her personal demons and the dangerous assassin clan known as the Hand.

programme.title: Hollywood on Set S1 Ep929
programme.desc: Go behind the scenes of three major motion pictures per week; catch action footage and interviews with actors and filmmakers.

programme.title: Superman: Man of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Follow the fledgling hero as he engages in bloody battles with intergalactic bounty hunter Lobo and before fighting for his life with the alien Parasite.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: Tom Cruise aims high as he vies to be the best Navy fighter pilot. A classic of the 80s that made Cruise a star.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: The quest for perfection drives two magicians to the very edge of sanity and morality.
At the height of the First World War, two young British soldiers must race against time to cross enemy territory and deliver a message that will stop a deadly attack.

programme.title: Assassin's Creed
programme.desc: Through a technology that unlocks his memories, Callum discovers he is a descendant of an ancient line of Assassins and amasses lethal skills to take on the oppressive Templar Order.

programme.title: Six Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Just before World War II, a teacher disappears in an English boarding school for the daughters of top Nazi officials. British agent Miller is sent to find out what happened, much to his own peril.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: When a threat emerges that puts Bird and Pig Islands in danger, Red, Chuck, Bomb and Mighty Eagle recruit Chuck's sister and team up with pigs to forge an unsteady truce to save their homes.

programme.title: Fast Five
programme.desc: Vin Diesel and Paul Walker lead a reunion of returning all-stars in the biggest thrill ride of this explosive franchise built on speed.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep01
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep02
